group_1.narration: From the distant past to far into the future,@beyond the furthest reaches of the sky...
The Goddess of all Magical Girls@sits and listens intently to a multitude@of records in a wondrous land.
Countless spinning grooves@play a song in unison,@a song of hope for Magical Girls.
When more voices sing in harmony@than star droplets in the heavens,@the round-faced Goddess@smiles warmly to herself.
After she finishes listening@to each and every singing voice,@the Goddess quietly rises from her throne@to soar up the river of the Milky Way.
"O Great Door, please let me in."
Slowly two vortexes, one large, one small, @poke out of the nothingness as if in@response to her magic words, like the@Magellanic Clouds floating in the night sky.
In the next moment, the Goddess@finds herself in a mysterious room@with several windows floating in the air.
What is this secret room@that opens up with a password?
The Goddess closes her eyes knowingly,@and stretches her arms out,@her palms facing upwards.
Then, would you believe it?@A mysterious, glowing key appears,@floating and drifting slowly@toward one of the windows.
It's like a dragonfly, attracted to@a lantern on a summer night...
One of the windows swallows the key up@and displays a memory.
The memory that appears@is the story of a girl.
A girl who traversed time, over@and over, to save her closest friend,@and to keep the promise she had made.
That girl's name was Homura Akemi...
